thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: British American Tobacco Hasn’t Run Out of Fire

author: Stephen Wilmot
title: British American Tobacco Hasn’t Run Out of Fire
text:
British American Tobacco could be forgiven for missing the good old days of straightforward market decline.
After years of managing declining smoking rates, higher regulation and taxes, the cigarette industry is being convulsed by a growth craze. This is driven principally by a new type of cigarette, designed to be heated rather than combusted, that has taken Japan by storm. Elsewhere results are mixed.
Marlboro-owner...
